summary: A mix of CNHF, UNPC and UNPCM, which I have imaginatively named HFCM
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]I wanted a curvy yet buff body for my Dragonborn and this is the result. Itâ€™s mostly a mix of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44979/?]CNHF[/url], UNPC and [url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/]UNPCM[/url], which I have imaginatively named HFCM.

Here is the bodyslide preset if anybody wants to play with it.

Pictured mods[/size][list]
[*][size=2]Skin textures: [url=http://skydevgru.tumblr.com/post/120815089513/graphene-sr-3c-20-mission-humanoid-female]Graphene Block20[/url] (hard normals) with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72091/?]Barbarous Beauty[/url] diffuse maps and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25588/?]Xenius Specular Maps[/url] (right at the bottom of the files tab)[/size]
[*][size=2]ENB: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70451/?]Snapdragon Prime[/url] (Sparta)[/size]
[/list]
author: anotheraza
